SEARCH
Package org.pipservices4.messaging.queues

Class CachedMessageQueue

java.lang.Object
org.pipservices4.messaging.queues.MessageQueue
org.pipservices4.messaging.queues.CachedMessageQueue
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.pipservices4.components.config.IConfigurable, org.pipservices4.components.refer.IReferenceable, org.pipservices4.components.run.ICleanable, org.pipservices4.components.run.IClosable, org.pipservices4.components.run.IOpenable, IMessageQueue
public abstract class CachedMessageQueue extends MessageQueue implements org.pipservices4.components.run.ICleanable
Message queue that caches received messages in memory to allow peek operations that may not be supported by the undelying queue.

This queue is users as a base implementation for other queues

    • peek

      public MessageEnvelope peek(org.pipservices4.components.context.IContext context) throws org.pipservices4.commons.errors.InvalidStateException
      Peeks a single incoming message from the queue without removing it. If there are no messages available in the queue it returns null.
      Specified by:
      peek in interface IMessageQueue
      Specified by:
      peek in class MessageQueue
      Parameters:
      context - (optional) a context to trace execution through call chain.
      Returns:
      a peeked message or null.
      Throws:
      org.pipservices4.commons.errors.InvalidStateException

    • peekBatch

      public List<MessageEnvelope> peekBatch(org.pipservices4.components.context.IContext context, int messageCount) throws org.pipservices4.commons.errors.InvalidStateException
      Peeks multiple incoming messages from the queue without removing them. If there are no messages available in the queue it returns an empty list.

      Important: This method is not supported by MQTT.

      Specified by:
      peekBatch in interface IMessageQueue
      Specified by:
      peekBatch in class MessageQueue
      Parameters:
      context - (optional) a context to trace execution through call chain.
      messageCount - a maximum number of messages to peek.
      Returns:
      a list with peeked messages.
      Throws:
      org.pipservices4.commons.errors.InvalidStateException
